entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
